description: Starts the workflow when GetResponse events occur

properties.name: events
properties.description: Receive notifications when a customer is subscribed to a list

properties.name: Customer Unsubscribed
properties.description: Receive notifications when a customer is unsubscribed from a list

properties.name: Email Clicked
properties.description: Receive notifications when a email is clicked

properties.name: Email Opened
properties.description: Receive notifications when a email is opened

properties.name: Survey Submitted
properties.description: Receive notifications when a survey is submitted

properties.name: listIds
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to delete the current subscription
